name: She Salutes
description:
Your country has been overrun by monsters of mysterious origin. You are a captain in a military base under the command of a beautiful colonel. Having lost all contact with the rest of the world, you try to lead your troops and aid the colonel in fighting the monsters and a enemy nation to the north.
You will have to gather supplies, food, and ammunition. Resource management is important in these stringent times. Upgrade your gear to improve and customize your combat skills. Learn the strengths and role of each class and unit. Take care of morale. Befriend your fellow officers and turn them into your lovers. Defend your base and country.
Turn-based combat, fast-paced, tactical RPG in a post-apocalyptic environment.
Note: The game contains graphic, uncensored sexual content.
